name: Quest for Caladrius
description:
Get ready for a visual novel about greed, lust and hope.

Our game is a visual novel with mini-games where you help people along the way with their everyday problems so that you may find and obtain the caladrius' tears that will heal your sick kid.

-- Credits --
Artists: Emma Capion Avnbøl and Vik Liv Nielsen
Programmers: Omid Marfavi, Viktor Máni Mønster and Nicholas Hansen
Producer/Manager: Isabella Ringbæk
